title: Kiri Te Kanawa
brief_description: Accompanied by well-known pianist Richard Amner, Dame Kiri offers a selection of pieces from various composers, including Schubert’s “Gretchen Am Spinnrade”, Strauss’ “Muttertandelei” and three delightful pieces from Walton with poems by Dame Edith Sitwell “Through Golden Trellises”, “Daphne” and “Old Sir Faulk”.
